org.apache.ignite.internal.util.ipc.shmem

Class IpcSharedMemoryServerEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.util.ipc.shmem.IpcSharedMemoryServerEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, IpcServerEndpoint

    public class IpcSharedMemoryServerEndpoint
extends Object
implements IpcServerEndpoint
    Server shared memory IPC endpoint.

      • DFLT_SPACE_SIZE

        public static final int DFLT_SPACE_SIZE
        Default shared memory space in bytes.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DFLT_TOKEN_DIR_PATH

        public static final String DFLT_TOKEN_DIR_PATH
        Default token directory. Note that this path is relative to IGNITE_HOME/work folder if IGNITE_HOME system or environment variable specified, otherwise it is relative to work folder under system java.io.tmpdir folder.
        See Also:
        IgniteConfiguration.getWorkDirectory(), Constant Field Values

      • TOKEN_FILE_NAME

        public static final String TOKEN_FILE_NAME
        Shared memory token file name prefix. Token files are created and stored in the following manner: [tokDirPath]/[nodeId]-[current PID]/gg-shmem-space-[auto_idx]-[other_party_pid]-[size]
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

           throws IgniteCheckedException
        Starts configured endpoint implementation.
        Specified by:

      • accept

        public IpcEndpoint accept()
                   throws IgniteCheckedException
        Accepts client IPC connection. After client connection is accepted, it can be used for IPC. This method will block until client connects to IPC server endpoint.
        Specified by:
        accept in interface IpcServerEndpoint
        Returns:
        Accepted client connection.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If accept failed and the endpoint is not usable anymore.

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Gets port endpoint is bound to. Endpoints who does not bind to any port should return -1.
        Specified by:
        getPort in interface IpcServerEndpoint
        Returns:
        Port number.

      • getHost

        @Nullable
public String getHost()
        Gets host endpoint is bound to. Endpoints who does not bind to any port should return null.
        Specified by:
        getHost in interface IpcServerEndpoint
        Returns:
        Host.

      • isManagement

        public boolean isManagement()
        Indicates if this endpoint is a management endpoint.
        Specified by:
        isManagement in interface IpcServerEndpoint
        Returns:
        false as shared memory endpoints can not be used for management.
